text: Farrah Fawcett and Ryan O ’ Neal ’ s son, Redmond O ’ Neal, has been charged with attempted murder and assault after he severely injured two people during a string of attacks in Los Angeles in May. The Los Angeles Police Department ’ s Pacific Area began investigating a violent robbery spree in early May that took place in the Venice Beach and Palms areas, where five men were attacked in unprovoked confrontations by a white, male suspect with red hair and tattoos. Two of the victims were seriously injured. O ’ Neal, 33, the only son of the late Charlie ’ s Angels star who died in 2009, was arrested on May 8 after he was identified as the suspect in an armed robbery at a 7 - Eleven.
